Corporate Security Guard.description: Standard corporate security personnel equipped with light armor and non-lethal weaponry.

Street Thug.description: Common criminal looking for an easy score. Typically armed with improvised weapons.

Cyberpsycho.description: Individual suffering from cyberware-induced psychosis. Highly dangerous and unpredictable.

Corporate Enforcer.description: Elite corporate security with military-grade augmentations and weaponry.

Rogue AI Drone.description: Autonomous security drone that has broken free from its programming constraints.

Black Market Surgeon.description: Unethical medical professional who deals in illegal augmentations and organs.

NetRunner.description: Elite hacker who can attack through both physical and digital means.

Combat Robot.description: Heavily armored autonomous combat unit designed for urban pacification.

Corpo Assassin.description: Corporate hitman with state-of-the-art stealth augmentations and weaponry.

Gang Lieutenant.description: High-ranking gang member with extensive combat augmentations.

Street Doc.description: Underground medical practitioner specializing in illegal cybernetic enhancements.

Mercenary.description: Professional soldier for hire, equipped with military-grade weapons and tactical training.

Corporate Scientist.description: Researcher with cybernetic enhancements to boost cognitive function, often protected by security systems.

Cyber-Dog.description: Augmented canine with combat implants and reinforced skeleton.

Security Turret.description: Automated weapon system with motion tracking and facial recognition.
